message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $9,500. This is a high-quality item that I believe will greatly benefit you, considering its value to you is $10,000. Let me know if this proposal works for you or if you'd like to make a counteroffer.

Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $9,500 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. This price is fair given its value to me and the fact that it's worth $8,000 to you. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counterproposal. Given the value of the product to both of us, I am willing to consider $9,000 as a fair price for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations. Let me know if this proposal is acceptable or if you would like to continue negotiating.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $9,000, but I'm still a bit too high. I'm willing to pay $8,750. This price is a fair compromise given the value of the product to both of us. Let me know if this works for you.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering our positions, I am willing to accept $8,900 as a final price for the product. I believe this price reflects the value of the product to both of us and I hope this proposal will be agreeable to you.
